title: Babel Tower - a free helicoidal text reader for your iPhone
content:
Consider it as the first of a line of experimental apps for the AppStore:

[http://itunes.apple.com/app/babel-tower/id358731708?mt=8](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012212935/http:/itunes.apple.com/app/babel-tower/id358731708?mt=8)

And also as a follow-up to a couple of discussions that took place here around one year ago: [1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012212935/http:/typophile.com/node/55496), [2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012212935/http:/typophile.com/node/55691)
